attributes.action: stop discriminating against under 22 year olds by making the national minimum wage the same for all and stop businesses using young people as a way of cutting costs by paying young people as little as £3.40 per hour.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently the national minimum wage rates are £5.52-over 22 year olds £4.60-18-21 years olds and £3.40 Under 18's. 
Stop this unfair discrimination of young people who are doing the same job as older colleagues but getting paid considerably less. This is particularly unfair for students who now have to pay high tuition fees but still don't get paid the national minimum wage for part-time work in order to manage living costs.
